meanings.definition: Superlative form of pillow, meaning most resembling or characteristic of a pillow.
meanings.sent1: The cloud looked like the pillowiest thing in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her bed was the pillowiest spot in the house.
meanings.sent3: The puppy found the pillowiest cushion to nap on.
meanings.sent4: The softest blanket felt pillowiest against her skin.
meanings.sent5: The pillowiest clouds floated lazily in the sky, inviting daydreams.

meanings.definition: Comparative form of pillow, meaning more resembling or characteristic of a pillow.
meanings.sent1: This cushion is pillowier than the one on the couch.
meanings.sent2: The new fabric is softer and pillowier than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The pillowier the blanket, the better the nap.
meanings.sent4: The pillowier the clouds, the more likely it will rain.
meanings.sent5: The pillowier the mattress, the more comfortable the sleep.
